code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import me from'../assets/me.png';import aos from'aos';import'aos/dist/aos.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var About=function About(){useEffect(function(){aos.init({duration:1500});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"About","data-aos":"fade-up",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full bg-white py-16 px-4 dark:bg-black mx-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-[1240px] mx-auto grid md:grid-cols-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{"data-aos":"flip-right","data-aos-duration":1000,className:"rounded-xl w-[500px] mx-auto my-4",src:me,alt:"img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col justify-center mx-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-[#c288fc] font-bold text-xl sm:text-2xl md:text-3xl dark:text-[#fcdf88]",children:" About Me "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"md:text-4xl sm:text-3xl text-2xl font-bold py-2 dark:text-white",children:" Please hire me for internships :pray: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"dark:text-white mt-8",children:"Hey there, I'm Kevin Wu, and I'm thrilled to be an upcoming Computer Science student at the University of Waterloo.
